summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.6°C) and outside temperature (down 2.2°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 269 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1734 m), feels like temperature (up 5.4°C), outside temperature (up 4.2°C), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 269.2m lower than yesterday, 1180.0m lower than past week, 1734.1m lower than past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 765m and a peak of 2220m, averaging 996.5m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. A few light raindrops may fall, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and the light is absent. Weather could become unsettled.
